alert.note: Alert for Kauai North; Kauai Southwest; Niihau (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued December 12 at 4:04AM HST until December 14 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR NORTH AND WEST FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU KAUAI OAHU MOLOKAI AND NORTH FACING SHORES OF MAUI... .A large northwest swell will build from northwest to southeast down the island chain today, then peak tonight and Wednesday. The swell will bring advisory level surf to most north and west facing shores of the smaller islands. ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 6 AM HST THURSDAY... * WHAT...For north facing shores, surf building to 12 to 16 feet this afternoon, then rising to 15 to 20 feet tonight and Wednesday. For west facing shores, surf building to 9 to 12 feet this afternoon, then rising to 12 to 16 feet tonight and Wednesday. * WHERE...North and west facing shores of Niihau and Kauai. * WHEN...From noon today to 6 AM HST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Moderate. Strong breaking waves and strong currents will make swimming dangerous.
info.instruction: Head all advice from ocean safety officials. When in doubt, don`t go out.
